page.title: 12LOCAL EVENTS
page.content:
{Gwysaney Hall }- is used for several local events. A fair has been held there for the last eight consecutive years, which educates the people in the ways of the countryside. The gardens are to be opened to the public this summer, and last year hawk demonstrations were introduced. Guides and Scouts hold their annual camps on the estate.
{Rhosesmor }- summer fair organised by the local institute, and a play scheme is held every summer holiday.
{Rhydymwyn }- several fetes are held each year (W.I.,Church,School). There is also a play scheme in the summer holidays. There are regular horse gymkhanas monthly in the summer.
